name: Patent-Evaluation-Assistant
description: Analyzes a patent's title or abstract to identify related technologies, real-world applications, and potential overlaps with existing solutions.

appStages.name: Introduction
Patent-Usecase-Evaluator
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003ePatent Evaluation Assistant!\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eProvide the required details below to generate results.\u003c/li\u003e\n       \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Patent Title",
              "placeholder": "ex. Blockchain-Based Supply Chain Tracking",
              "description": "What\u0027s the name of your invention?",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "patent_title",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Patent Abstract",
              "placeholder": "ex. A decentralized ledger system that tracks the movement of goods across a supply chain to ensure transparency, reduce fraud, and improve traceability.",
              "description": "Give us a quick elevator pitch of the patent – what it does, how, and why.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "patent_abstract",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Tech Domain",
              "placeholder": "ex. Blockchain, Logistics Tech",
              "description": "Which tech playground does this belong to? (AI, IoT, Quantum Computing, etc.)",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "tech_domain",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Target Industry",
              "placeholder": "ex. Food, Pharmaceuticals",
              "description": "Which industries or areas will actually use this invention?",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "target_industry",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns1",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Results:",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "genAiResponse",
      "type": "textarea",
      "input": true,
      "isUploadEnabled": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Go Back",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "secondary",
              "customClass": "btn-outline rounded m-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "goBack",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "back",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Generate",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded m-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "generate",
              "type": "button",
              "input": true,
              "event": "execute"
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns2",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    }
  ]
}
